Nerangs.ab: yaθā ahū vairiiō yek gere andar aivyanghan zadan va be š́iiaoθananąm gere saḫt kardan va be dovvom yaθā ahū vairiiō dovvom gere zadan š́iiaoθananąm saḫt kardan pas sar-e aivanghan bar barsom pičidan har do dast be-barsom māhruy moḥkam nahādan.

"At the (first) Ahuna Vairiia, he should tie a knot in the aivanghan and pull it tightly at š́iiaoθananąm. At the second Ahuna Vairiia, he has to tie a second knot and pull it tightly at š́iiaoθananąm. He should twist the end of the aivanghan in the barsom and fix it with both hands to the māhruy of the barsom."
